Uses of Interface
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata.MetadataEditingInterface

Packages that use MetadataEditingInterface
Package
Description
oh_hecc
All these classes are used within OH-HECC (Optional Help for HECC) to do stuff basically.
oh_hecc.game_parts
This package basically holds the game parts for a HECCIN Game.
oh_hecc.game_parts.component_editing_windows
These classes are here as a GUI to edit individual EditablePassage/EditableMetadata objects.
oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata
Classes that allow the metadata info for a heccin game to be edited.
oh_hecc.mvc
Some model-view-controller bits for OH-HECC.
